_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ForwardingInstructions.description: A document issued to a forwarder, giving instructions regarding the action to be taken for the forwarding of goods described therein. Forwarding Instructions is used by any party who gives instructions for the transportation services required for a consignment of goods to any party who is contracted to provide the transportation services. The parties who issue this document are commonly referred to as the shipper or consignor, while the parties who receive this document are forwarders, carriers, shipping agents, etc. This document may also be issued by a forwarder or shipping agent in its capacity as a shipper. This document can be used to arrange for the transportation (1) of different types of goods or cargoes; (2) whether containerized or non-containerized; (3) through different modes of transport including multi-modal; and (4) from any origin to any destination.

ForwardingInstructions.title: Forwarding Instructions. Details
ForwardingInstructions.description: A document issued to a forwarder, giving instructions regarding the action to be taken for the forwarding of goods described therein. Forwarding Instructions is used by any party who gives instructions for the transportation services required for a consignment of goods to any party who is contracted to provide the transportation services. The parties who issue this document are commonly referred to as the shipper or consignor, while the parties who receive this document are forwarders, carriers, shipping agents, etc. This document may also be issued by a forwarder or shipping agent in its capacity as a shipper. This document can be used to arrange for the transportation (1) of different types of goods or cargoes; (2) whether containerized or non-containerized; (3) through different modes of transport including multi-modal; and (4) from any origin to any destination.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Forwarding Instructions. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Forwarding Instructions. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Forwarding Instructions. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Forwarding Instructions. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Forwarding Instructions. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CarrierAssignedID.title: Forwarding Instructions. Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
CarrierAssignedID.description: Reference number assigned by a carrier or its agent to identify a specific shipment, such as a booking reference number when cargo space is reserved prior to loading.

UUID.title: Forwarding Instructions. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Forwarding Instructions. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Forwarding Instructions. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Name.title: Forwarding Instructions. Name
Name.description: Text, assigned by the sender, that identifies this document to business users.

Description.title: Forwarding Instructions. Description. Text
Description.description: Textual description of the document instance.

Note.title: Forwarding Instructions. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentStatusCode.title: Forwarding Instructions. Document Status Code. Code
DocumentStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of the Forwarding Instructions with respect to its original state. This code may be used if the document precedes the event and is subsequently found to be incorrect and in need of cancellation or revision.

ShippingOrderID.title: Forwarding Instructions. Shipping Order Identifier. Identifier
ShippingOrderID.description: Reference number to identify a Shipping Order.

ToOrderIndicator.title: Forwarding Instructions. To Order_ Indicator. Indicator
ToOrderIndicator.description: Indicates whether the transport document is consigned to order.

AdValoremIndicator.title: Forwarding Instructions. Ad Valorem_ Indicator. Indicator
AdValoremIndicator.description: A term used in commerce in reference to certain duties, called ad valorem duties, which are levied on commodities at certain rates per centum on their value.

DeclaredCarriageValueAmount.title: Forwarding Instructions. Declared Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCarriageValueAmount.description: Value declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

OtherInstruction.title: Forwarding Instructions. Other_ Instruction. Text
OtherInstruction.description: Contains other free-text instructions to the forwarders or carriers related to the shipment. This should only be used where such information cannot be represented in other structured information entities within the document.

ConsignorParty.title: Forwarding Instructions. Consignor_ Party. Party
ConsignorParty.description: The party consigning goods, as stipulated in the transport contract by the party ordering transport.

CarrierParty.title: Forwarding Instructions. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: The party providing the transport of goods between named points.

FreightForwarderParty.title: Forwarding Instructions. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party
FreightForwarderParty.description: A party combining individual smaller consignments into a single larger shipment (a so-called consolidated consignment or shipment) that is sent to a counterpart who mirrors the consolidator's activity by dividing the consolidated consignment into its original components.

Shipment.title: Forwarding Instructions. Shipment
Shipment.description: An identifiable collection of one or more goods items to be transported between the seller party and the buyer party.

DocumentReference.title: Forwarding Instructions. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

ExchangeRate.title: Forwarding Instructions. Exchange Rate
ExchangeRate.description: Information about the rate of exchange (conversion) between two currencies.

DocumentDistribution.title: Forwarding Instructions. Document Distribution
DocumentDistribution.description: A list of interested parties to whom this document is distributed.

Signature.title: Forwarding Instructions. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
